snippet: Experts say a seat in business class is worth the cost if working while aloft is critical.
abstract: Experts say an airline seat in business class is worth the cost if working while flying is critical; business travelers say if you have to fly in coach, you should not expect to get work done.
lead_paragraph: Experts say a seat in business class is worth the cost if working while aloft is critical.

headline.seo: Working in Coach? Don’t Count on It
headline.main: Plan to Do Work in Coach? You’d Better Not Count on It
headline.print_headline: Plan to Do Work in Coach? You’d Better Not Count on It
